1001.Name: Moonlight Cha-Cha
1001.RecipeText: One serving of Blue Citrus Serum and Lemonade each
1001.IntroductionText: "Dear, let the moon and sea breeze intertwine into a kiss, and dance with me on the deck." A drink favored by couples in Asterleeds, if tasted during a date, <style="emph-gn">romance</style> points conservatively increase by 0.01%!
1001.Title: "Must-order item for dates"

1002.Name: Margherita Sunset
1002.RecipeText: One serving of Red Berry Serum and Lemonade each
1002.IntroductionText: A sip of this, and you're back at the seaside at dusk, when your beloved turns and smiles. Warm, <style="emph-gn">hazy</style> memories in a glass (even if just a little).
1002.Title: "Beloved by elegant people"

1003.Name: Hot Sand Paradise
1003.RecipeText: One serving of Red Berry Serum and one serving of Soda, needs to be served hot
1003.IntroductionText: "<style="emph-gn">Burn</style> with the waves, my soul!" Bold, spicy, and rebellious-this drink is for seaside boys becoming men. One sip, and your mood blazes like the afternoon sun.
1003.Title: "Favored by tough guys"

1004.Name: Silent Sea Breeze
1004.RecipeText: One serving of Blue Citrus Serum and one serving of Soda, needs to be served with ice
1004.IntroductionText: "If you hate or love someone, order this drink for him/her." No need for words, the <style="emph-gn">silence</style> after drinking is the best answer.
1004.Title: "Top recommendation for art lovers"

1005.Name: A Touch of Neon
1005.RecipeText: Two servings of Red Berry Serum, needs to be served hot
1005.IntroductionText: Always <style="emph-gn">safe</style>, always popular. Warm, sweet with a hint of artificial bitterness, it might be the first adult drink for young people.
1005.Title: "Ignites a youth storm"

1006.Name: Coral Ice Sea
1006.RecipeText: Two servings of Blue Citrus Serum, needs to be served with ice
1006.IntroductionText: In Asterleeds, no one has seen a <style="emph-gn">frozen</style> sea, but that doesn't stop them from imagining it on their tongues.
1006.Title: "Exclusive special for the Seabreeze Festival"

2001.Name: "Hot Sand Paradise"
2001.IntroductionText: It is the true choice for tough guys. Tough-guys, you understand? Its color is as powerful as flames. The moment you drink it, your heart and soul feel ignited...

5001.Name: Failed Drink
5001.IntroductionText: An undrinkable beverage, a failed creation was born. But it's okay, everything can be tried again, including making drinks.
5001.Title: "Mysterious... very mysterious"
